sentences.en: We ate in the restaurant, as opposed to the bistro.
sentences.cn: 我们是在饭店吃的饭，而不是在小酒馆。

sentences.en: To drink one last cup of coffeeat the Lyric Bistro in Clayton.
sentences.cn: 在克莱顿的抒情的小酒馆再喝上最后一杯咖啡。

sentences.en: I decided to go to my favorite place a little bistro called daVinci's.
sentences.cn: 我决定去一个我最中意的地方，一家叫达芬奇的小酒馆。
